name: One Per Customer VR
description:
This game is a submission for VR Jam 2022 and was made in 9 days!

Start the game by taking your one allocated cheese per customer and experiment with your surroundings to see how much cheese you can steal! Spill milk, bring animals into the store, smash stuff, a fourth thing!

Just remember, each method will only work once. Plan accordingly! Or don't, it's up to you really.

I hope you enjoy your shop at BotMart!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi there, I made this game in 9 days for my first ever game jam, the 2022 VR Jam, and One Per Customer also happens to be my first game... Ever. I started learning how to code and develop games about 2 weeks ago and I really hope that this first release, as small and insignificant as it may be,  brightens your day at least a little bit!

Have a good one!

- SnoopingTurtle
